title: Bitcoin Flashes Rare Buy Signal Not Seen Since $49,000 And $74,000 Bottoms
summary: On-chain analyst Frank spotted a “buy” signal for Bitcoin, indicating potential price increases. This signal has historically led to significant swing lows at $

body.raw:
![Bitcoin Flashes Rare Buy Signal Not Seen Since $49,000 And $74,000 Bottoms](https://www.newsbtc.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/06/ChatGPT-Image-Jun-27-2025-08_11_24-AM.png?fit=750%2C500)

On-chain analyst Frank spotted a “buy” signal for Bitcoin, indicating potential price increases. This signal has historically led to significant swing lows at $49,000 and $74,000. Frank noted an Oversold print on the short-term holder MVRV bollinger bands, suggesting a bullish trend.

---

**Original Article:** [NewsBTC](https://www.newsbtc.com/bitcoin-news/bitcoin-buy-signal-not-since-49000-74000-bottoms/)

*This article was originally published on [NewsBTC](https://www.newsbtc.com/bitcoin-news/bitcoin-buy-signal-not-since-49000-74000-bottoms/) and has been curated for our readers.*
